import React from "react"; class Cart extends React.Component { render() { let button; let buttonR; console.log(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("Products") || "[]")); var tab = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("Products")); var total = 0; tab.forEach(element => { console.log(element.picture); total += element.price; }); if (JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("token")) !== null) { button = ( this.handleLogout()}> Déconnexion ); } else { button = ( Connexion ); buttonR = ( Inscription ); } return (
E-COMMERCE
Accueil Mon panier {button} {buttonR}
{tab.map(product => ( ))}
Produits Prix Quantités

{product.title}

{product.description}

 {product.price} €
Continuer vos achats Total: {total} €
Procéder au paiement
); } } export default Cart;
